ProductInfo.Features:
Stream Live Video Directly to a remote MAC or PC, iPhone, iPad, or Android. Receive email alerts with Snapshot upon motion detection.
4 Channel HD record and playback surveillance NVR; Power DC12V.
Includes 2 1.3MP cameras with Infra Red Cut Filter (ICR) function and powerful night vision to 66ft for indoor/outdoor use; Camera color: Black.
Free DDNS to use; Mini 1U case.
Includes 2 100ft pre-made RJ45 CAT5e cables.
ProductInfo.Name: Insmartec In-KN3942U IP Security System 4 Channel NVR with 2 1.3 Megapixel 720P IP Camera Outdoor Security Bullet Cameras IR Night Vision and 500 GB Hard Drive Surveillance CCTV Camera System (Black)
